name: Graham Campbell
body:
## Bootstrap Site
**Bootstrap Site is a simple website templating system, soon to be a CMS**  
For more, visit https://github.com/GrahamCampbell/Bootstrap-Site  

#### dsmg.co.uk
**The official Durham School Media Group website built using Bootstrap Site**  
For more, visit https://github.com/DSMG/dsmg.co.uk  

#### electronics.dsmg.co.uk
**The official Durham School Electronics Club website built using Bootstrap Site**  
For more, visit https://github.com/ElectronicsClub/electronics.dsmg.co.uk  

#### tristram.dsmg.co.uk
**The official Durham School Tristram Society website built using Bootstrap Site**  
For more, visit https://github.com/TristramSociety/tristram.dsmg.co.uk  


## Moppy Project
**Code for a musical floppy drive array**  
For more, visit https://github.com/ElectronicsClub/Moppy-Project  


## Tank Project
**Code for an arduino and pi powered tank**  
For more, visit https://github.com/ElectronicsClub/Tank-Project  


## Dropbox Repo
**This is a way to download dropbox files via a pretty http url**  
For more, visit https://github.com/GrahamCampbell/Dropbox-Repo  


## Dropbox Player
**This is a quick experiment with the dropbox api with vb.net**  
For more, visit https://github.com/GrahamCampbell/Dropbox-Player-V1  


## Homeostasis Test
**This is a quick program with vb.net to test users on homeostatis**  
For more, visit https://github.com/GrahamCampbell/Homeostasis-Test-V1
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
